description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! GX takes place 10 years after the original Yu-Gi-Oh!.
Ten years after the Ceremonial Battle, a teenage boy named Yuuki Judai heads off in order to join the Duelist Yousei School located on a remote island off the coast of Japan.
There he meets his fellow students and gains a few friends, along with a few enemies.
Judai is put into the lowest rank of Osiris Red, but he continues to test his skills against the students and faculty to prove his worth as a Yousei Duelist and earn the respect of everyone around him.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
When Judai Yuki arrives late to his entrance exam for Duel Academia, he has to go above and beyond expectations to prove that he deserves to make the cut!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The One Who Inherits the Game

REGULAR.description:
The incoming class is welcomed to Duel Academia, but Judai finds a less-than-warm reception from freshman hot shot Jun when he’s challenged to a high-stakes duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: フレイム・ウィングマン

REGULAR.description:
When Sho stumbles into the girls’ dorm, he puts himself and Judai in danger of being expelled, forcing Judai to win a duel to win their freedom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エトワール・サイバー

REGULAR.description:
On test day at Duel Academia, Instructor Cronos steals a new card shipment so that he can stack the deck against Judai and embarrass him in front of the entire school!
Source: crunchyroll

When Judai and the crew wander into an abandoned dorm, they encounter a mysterious duelist who claims he’s taken Asuka to the Shadow Realm, and unless Judai duels him, he’s going to keep her there.
Source: crunchyroll

Judai continues his duel with the mysterious Shadow Duelist, fighting now not just for Asuka’s soul, but for his own as well!
Source: crunchyroll

Having been caught for trespassing into the abandoned dorm, Judai and Sho are sentenced to a tag team duel where if they lose, they get expelled.  Therefore, to prepare for the big match, they decide to duel each other!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 翔の乗り物(ビークロイド)デッキ

REGULAR.description:
To help Sho overcome some serious confidence issues, Judai looks to duel Ryo, Sho’s older brother and the best duelist at Duel Academy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最強! サイバーエンドドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
When Hayato’s father comes to remove him from Duel Academia, Judai and Sho stand by their friend and root him on when he tries to out-duel his father in order to stay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Single Attack Shot! Upsetting the Table!
一撃必殺! ちゃぶ台返し

REGULAR.description:
The tag match to determine Judai and Sho’s fate at Duel Academy begins, but not just against any tag team: It`s against the legendary Meikyu Brothers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’épreuve de duel en équipe - 1re partie
十代&翔! タッグデュエル(前編)

REGULAR.description:
In the expulsion match against the Meikyu Brothers, Sho must overcome his issues with his older brother Ryo in order win the match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’épreuve de duel en équipe - 2e partie
十代&翔! タッグデュエル(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Instructor Cronos taps dueling whiz kid Daichi Misawa to be his new protégé, but first he must beat Obelisk Blue’s Jun Manjome to prove he’s got what it takes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 酸素+水素=H2O(ウォーター)ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
When Jun suddenly goes missing, Judai and the crew go looking for him, but instead of finding Jun, they find a dueling monkey who takes one of Asuka’s friends hostage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce n’est pas à un vieux singe qu’on apprend à faire un duel
野生解放! SALデュエル

REGULAR.description:
After some students accidentally summon a Duel Monster for real, it’s up to Judai to duel him and win their souls back.
Source: crunchyroll

Judai finds himself in an outrageously competitive duel against a sports nut who’s bent winning Asuka`s heart and making Judai look bad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 青春のデュエルテニス

REGULAR.description:
After a menacing Duel Giant is seen around campus, Instructor Chronos convinces Judai to track him down, but when Judai catches up with the titan, he must beat him in a duel or become his next victim!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: King Goblin of the Dark Night
闇夜のキングゴブリン

REGULAR.description:
When someone is stealing from the Card Shack, Judai and the crew go on a stakeout to catch the culprit, but when the thief turns out to be a former student who’s been living in the jungle, a truly wild duel ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドロー! ドロー! ドロー!

REGULAR.description:
A copycat duelist steals Yugi Muto’s deck and mannerisms, and Judai must duel him to win it back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel contre le maître des copieurs - 1re partie

REGULAR.description:
Judai continues his duel against the copycat duelist, trying his best to defeat the legendary and powerful deck that was used by the King of Games.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel contre le maître des copieurs - 2e partie

REGULAR.description:
When a love-struck girl sneaks into the boys` dorm, Judai challenges her to a duel to find out exactly why she’s there and what she wants.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi Suru Otome wa Tsuyoi no yo Deck!
The Strong Deck with Beloved Maiden
恋する乙女は強いのよデッキ!

REGULAR.description:
To decide who will be Duel Academia’s representative at the high stakes School Duel with North Academia, Judai and Misawa must battle it out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fusion Seal! Judai VS Misawa Part 1
融合封じ! 十代VS三沢(前編)

REGULAR.description:
Judai and Misawa continue their duel to see who will win the honor of representing Duel Academia at the School Duel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Wild Man Shoukan! Juudai vs Misawa (Kouhen)
Wild Man Summon! Judai VS Misawa Part 2
ワイルドマン召喚! 十代VS三沢(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Not being able to stomach the thought of Judai representing Duel Academia at the School Duel, Instructor Cronos arranges a duel where if Judai loses, he’ll end up in a lazy daze forever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 脱力! もけもけデュエル

REGULAR.description:
When Jun ends up shipwrecked at sea, he suddenly finds himself at the doors of North Academia and in a fifty-man duel gauntlet to prove his worth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 復活! 万丈目サンダー

REGULAR.description:
It’s Judai versus Jun at the School Duel, and with Jun’s brothers in attendance ordering Jun to win or else, the stakes have never been higher.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Manjyoume Thunder Part 1, Threat of Armed Dragon
VS万丈目サンダー(前編) アームドドラゴンの脅威
Vs Manjoume Thunder (Zenpen), Armed Dragon no Kyoui

REGULAR.description:
Freedom is on the line as Judai and Jun continue to duel it out for school - and personal - pride!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Manjyoume Thunder Part 2, Armed Dragon LV7
VS万丈目サンダー(後編) アームドドラゴンLV7
Vs Manjoume Thunder (Kouhen), Armed Dragon LV7

REGULAR.description:
When Judai and the gang get trapped in an ancient world, it’s up to Judai to win a duel or be buried alive with the rest of his friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Extracurricular Lesson is a Duel of Darkness!? Part 1
課外授業は闇のデュエル!?(前編)

REGULAR.description:
Judai continues to battle in the duel of his life to save his friends and the chance to make it back to his world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Extracurricular Lesson is a Duel of Darkness!? Part 2
課外授業は闇のデュエル!?(後編)

REGULAR.description:
When the Shadow Riders descend upon Duel Academia to unleash the three Sacred Beast Cards, Judai’s up first to defend the school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Darkness Part 1, Challenge of Red-Eyes Black Dragon
VSダークネス(前編) 真紅眼の黒竜(レッドアイズ・ブラックドラゴン)の挑戦
Vs Darkness (Zenpen), Red-Eyes Black Dragon no Chousen

REGULAR.description:
Judai continues his duel against the Shadow Rider known as Nightshroud, who has extra mysteries of his own!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Darkness Part 2, Attack of Red-Eyes Darkness Dragon
VSダークネス(後編) 真紅眼の闇竜(レッドアイズ・ダークネスドラゴン)の攻撃
Vs Darkness (Kouhen), Red-Eyes Darkness Dragon no Kougeki

REGULAR.description:
A vampiress named Camula is the second Shadow Rider to arrive at Duel Academia, but she’s not there to suck blood, she’s there to suck up souls!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kronos VS the Blood-sucking Beauty (Vampire) Kamyuura
クロノスVS吸血美女(ヴァンパイア)カミューラ

REGULAR.description:
Camula continues to wreak havoc at Duel Academia, this time setting her sights on Ryo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiser VS Kamyuura, Opening Motion of Demon Vision
Kaiser vs Kamyuura, Genma no Tobira Hatsudou!
カイザーVSカミューラ 幻魔の扉発動!

REGULAR.description:
Judai steps up to confront Camula with the souls of Cronos and Ryo at stake.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 輝け! シャイニング・フレア・ウィングマン

REGULAR.description:
Judai and the gang get sucked into a strange vortex where a duelist who bears a striking resemblance to Kaiba forces Judai to face his worst fears or be overcome by them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Summertime Hot Bath Fumes! Blue-Eyes White Dragon!
湯けむり旅情! 青眼の白龍(ブルーアイズ・ホワイトドラゴン)

REGULAR.description:
Jun’s brothers have come back to Duel Academia for revenge, forcing Jun to face them in a duel where if he loses, the deed to Duel Academia will be passed to them!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoudai no Kessoku! Ojam Delta Hurricane
兄弟の結束! おジャマデルタハリケーン

REGULAR.description:
The third Shadow Rider arrives and uses all her feminine wiles and charms to distract Daichi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Misawa-chi VS Amazoness Mook in a Duel
Misawa-chi vs Amazoness Mook tori Duel
三沢っちVSアマゾネスムコとり決闘(デュエル)

REGULAR.description:
Judai must duel Tania to snap Daichi out of a lovestruck stupor and keep the Shadow Riders from winning another Spirit Key!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Human Bullet Duel! Amazoness` Death Ring
Nikudan Duel! Amazoness no Death Ring
肉弾決闘(デュエル)! アマゾネスのデスリング

REGULAR.description:
A pirate challenges Judai to a duel where if he loses, he’ll be forced to become the first mate of a new Duel Academia at the bottom of the ocean!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suichuu Duel! Densetsu no Miyako Atlantis
Underwater Duel! The Legendary Capital Atlantis
水中デュエル! 伝説の都アトランティス

REGULAR.description:
In a desperate bid for the remaining Spirit Keys, a unit of the Shadow Riders called the Dark Scorpions steal them... but they end up having to face Jun in a duel to unlock their magical powers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Great Detective Thunder VS Black Scorpion Illegal Digging Group
Meitantei Thunder vs Kuro Sanri Toukutsu Dan
名探偵サンダーVS黒サソリ盗掘団

REGULAR.description:
The fifth Shadow Rider is unleashed upon Duel Academia, and with an undefeated dueling record and a legendary reputation, he’s the most powerful one yet…or is he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: H・E・R・O(エイチイーアールオー)フラッシュ!

REGULAR.description:
Titan the Shadow Duelist persuades Asuka to duel him to by promising to return her brother’s memory is she wins… but if she loses, she’ll be the one in need of rescue!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dark Arena Hatsudou! Asuka vs Titan
Dark Arena Invoked! Asuka VS Titan
闇の闘牛場(ダーク・アリーナ)発動! 明日香VSタイタン

REGULAR.description:
It’s Duel Monsters Spirit Day at the Academia, but when someone who looks remarkably like Dark Magician Girl shows up for the annual Costume Duel, Sho goes gaga.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: School Festival Duel! Trespassing Bla-Magi Girl
学園祭デュエル! ブラマジガール乱入

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious Gambler shows up at Duel Academy, and he’s bent on dueling Asuka to prove his skills and his… love?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Second Love Chance to Asuka!?
明日香にセカンド・ラブ・チャンス!?

REGULAR.description:
When Judai and the gang go searching for Daitokuji, they find the seventh Shadow Rider instead, and he’s even more dangerous than they ever feared.
Source: crunchyroll

Judai must face Amnael, the seventh Shadow Rider, in a match that will decide not only his fate but the fate of all his friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Amunael! Elemental Hero Absolute Seal
VSアムナエル! E(エレメンタル)ヒーロー絶対封じ
Vs Amunael! Elemental Hero Zettai Fuuji

REGULAR.description:
Upon learning that the seventh Shadow Rider is really Daitokuji, Judai must rise to a whole new level of dueling expertise to win the high stakes match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fusion of the Chisuienfuu Style! Erikushiiraa
地水炎風(ちすいえんふう)融合! エリクシーラー

REGULAR.description:
Manjome arranges a duel with Asuka so that he can prove his love to her, but Asuka has other ideas.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asuka VS Manjyoume! Cyber Angel -Goddess of Arts and Wisdom-
Asuka vs Manjoume! Cyber Angel: Benten
明日香VS万丈目! サイバー・エンジェル -弁天-

REGULAR.description:
Kagemaru, the leader of the Shadow Riders, descends on Duel Academia and demands a duel with Judai so that he can raise the Sacred Beasts and win the power to rule the world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freiheit für die heiligen Ungeheuer? - Teil 1
Le réveil des bêtes sacrées - 1re partie

REGULAR.description:
Kagemaru and Judai duel each other with all their might as the fate of the world and Duel Monsters spirits everywhere hang in the balance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Freiheit für die heiligen Ungeheuer? - Teil 2
Le réveil des bêtes sacrées - 2e partie
VS Kagemaru Part 2, Three Demons Awaken

REGULAR.description:
When Hayato is accepted into Industrial Illusions`s card design program, he must beat Cronos in a duel to win his consent!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hayato VS Chronos! Sunrise of Ayers Rock
Hayato vs Chronos! Ayers Rock Sunrise
隼人VSクロノス! エアーズロックサンライズ

REGULAR.description:
Ryo picks Judai as his opponent at the prestigious Graduation Match, giving Judai the chance to avenge his earlier loss.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VSカイザー(前編)パワーボンド×(アンド)サイバーエンド
Versus Kaiser (Part One), Power Bond And Cyber End
Vs Kaiser (Zenpen) Power Bond and Cyber End

REGULAR.description:
Ryo and Judai battle it out in the last duel of the school year, settling once and for all who truly is the Academy’s best duelist.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VSカイザー(後編)ファイナル・フュージョン

REGULAR.description:
Year two at Duel Academia kicks off with a bang as an unknown freshman challenges Judai to a duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Beginning of Fate! Edo Phoenix the Freshman
Unmei no Hajimari! Shinnyuusei Ed Phoenix
運命のはじまり! 新入生エド・フェニックス

REGULAR.description:
In the first official duel of the school year, Jun faces the school’s top freshman for a chance to return to Obelisk Blue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Thunder VS The Elite! Mecha-Ojama King Takes Off
Thunder vs Elite-kun! Mecha-Ojama King Hasshin
サンダーVSエリート君! メカおジャマキング発進

REGULAR.description:
Judai throws down with a school bully to win back the Duel Disks he stole.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ティラノ剣山登場ざうるす!

REGULAR.description:
Sho squares off against Ran, the insect duelist, for a chance to advance to Ra Yellow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shou VS the Insect Maiden! Insect Princess
Shou vs Konchuu Shoujo! Insect Princess
翔VS昆虫少女! インセクト・プリンセス

REGULAR.description:
Ryo now a professional duelist, goes up against top-ranking pro Edo Phoenix as reports of a mysterious “demon” cause a local scare.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaiser VS Edo! Pro League Battle
Kaiser vs Ed! Pro League no Tatakai
カイザーVSエド! プロリーグの戦い

REGULAR.description:
Top-ranking pro Edo Phoenix comes to Duel Academy to challenge Judai to a duel.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une nouvelle race de héros - 1re partie
VS Edo (Part One), E Hero Against E Hero
VSエド(前編) Eヒーロー対Eヒーロー

REGULAR.description:
As the duel between Edo and Judai continues, we learn about Edo’s secret past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une nouvelle race de héros - 2e partie
VS Edo (Part Two), The Fated D Heroes
VSエド(後編) 運命のDヒーロー

REGULAR.description:
To drum-up publicity, Cronos tries to turn Asuka and her brother Fubuki into a pop-star dueling duo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asuka VS Fubuki! Down the Path of the Sibling Idols
Asuka vs Fubuki! Kyoudai Idol e no Michi
明日香VS吹雪! 兄妹アイドルへの道

REGULAR.description:
The always sinister and ever-creepy Saio arrives on Academy Island and sets his sights on Jun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saiou Appears! The Fated Tarot Deck
Toki-ou Toujou! Unmei no Tarot Deck
斎王登場! 運命のタロットデッキ

REGULAR.description:
Unable to duel, Judai sets off in search of answers and ends up in a strange world inhabited by… talking dolphin-men!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新E(エレメンタル)ヒーロー! ネオス

REGULAR.description:
A bizarre chef duels against Kenzan for a taste of his Pot Roast Surprise!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenzan VS Curry Demon! Spicy Duel
Kenzan vs Curry no Majin! Spicy Duel
剣山VSカレーの魔人! スパイシーデュエル

REGULAR.description:
After fighting for weeks over who is Judai’s true best friend, Sho and Kenzan decide to settle it with a duel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shou VS Kenzan! Memories of Big Bro for a Feverish Duel
Shou vs Kenzan! Aniki e no Atsuki Omoi Duel
翔VS剣山! アニキへの熱き想いデュエル

REGULAR.description:
After hitting rock bottom, Ryo encounters the sinister Monkey Saruyama who convinces him to join a dangerous underground dueling league!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hell Kaiser Ryou! Chimeratech Over Dragon
Hell Kaiser Ryou! Chimeratech Over Dragon
ヘルカイザー亮! キメラテック・オーバー・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
After roaming Academy Island for days without eating, Judai begins to hallucinate about his past duels.
Source: crunchyroll

In his triumphant return to Duel Academy, Judai faces Edo Phoenix in a battle to save his dorm.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Edo (Part One), New Power! Aqua Neos
VSエド(前編)新たな力! アクア・ネオス
Vs Ed (Zenpen) Arata na Chikara! Aqua Neos

REGULAR.description:
Judai has a lot to learn about his new deck as Edo’s Destiny Heroes continue to devastate him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Edo (Part Two), The Blazing Flare Neos
VSエド(後編)炎のフレア・ネオス
Vs Ed (Kouhen) Honoo no Flare Neos

REGULAR.description:
The heads of the school go head-to-head as Cronos faces Bonaparte to protect the Slifer Red dorm from destruction!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chronos VS Napoleon! March of the Toy Soldiers
Chronos Vs Napoleon! Toy Soldiers no Koushin
クロノスVSナポレオン! トイソルジャーの行進

REGULAR.description:
Jun, now under the influence of the evil Lord Saio, tries to convince Asuka to join the Society of Light.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 明日香VS万丈目ホワイトサンダー!

REGULAR.description:
Judai faces three-time video game champ Ryusei to protect his dorm.  But is Ryusei working for the evil Master Saio!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: VS Game Champ! The Giant Battleship Tetran Launches
VSゲームチャンプ! 巨大戦艦テトラン発進
Vs Game Champ! Kyoudai Senkan Tetran Hasshin

REGULAR.description:
Judai faces a sleazy attorney, known as X, who’s strategy is to destroy his opponent’s deck!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: デッキ破壊を破壊せよ

REGULAR.description:
In his ongoing search for powerful duelists, Saio sets his sights on Kenzan.  But little does Saio know that this dino duelist has a startling secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenzan VS Saiou! That`s Dinosaur DNA
Kenzan vs Saiou! Kyouryuu DNA Da Don
剣山VS斎王! 恐竜DNAだドン

REGULAR.description:
Judai faces Princess Rose and her Frog Princes in a fairytale frenzy!  Will it be a happy ending for Judai?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hades Frog! Living Frog! Des Frog!
黄泉ガエル! イキカエル! デスガエル!

REGULAR.description:
Saio sends his elite team of duelists, known as the Society of Light, to take down Judai’s best friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 修学旅行タッグデュエル

REGULAR.description:
Marufuji and Kenzan are in for nasty weather as Korimaru and Ikazuchimaru continue their onslaught.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 究極合体! レックスユニオン

REGULAR.description:
The last surviving member of the Light Brigade takes on Judai.  But who’s really behind this duel?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyoufu no Yoichi! Demi Ulgos EMA
The Four Dreaded Sovereigns! Demigod EMA
恐怖の四帝! デミウルゴス・EMA

REGULAR.description:
Judai and Edo enter a virtual labyrinth to battle Saio and her dueling partner... Saio!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ultimate Tag!? Judai & Edo (Part One)
最強タッグ!? 十代&エド(前編)

REGULAR.description:
The double duel continues as Edo and Judai battle Saio in a duel to determine who “the chosen duelist” is!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Ultimate Tag!? Judai & Edo (Part Two)
最強タッグ!? 十代&エド(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Judai is challenged to a duel by a mysterious young girl with a shocking secret!
Source: crunchyroll

Game show fanatic Tsugio Kanda challenges Judai to a duel in order to impress Asuka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: クイズデュエル!? VSナゾラー・パネル9

REGULAR.description:
Desperate for attention, Misawa breaks into the White Dorm and demands they admit him as a member.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Misawa VS Manjoume, Assault Cannon Beetle
Misawa vs Manjoume: Assault Canon Beetle
三沢VS万丈目 アサルト・キャノン・ビートル

REGULAR.description:
Ryo climbs to the “top of the world” to face his former master… Chancellor Samejima!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel sur le toit du monde
Hell Kaiser Ryou VS Master Samejima
Hell Kaiser Ryou vs Master Samejima
ヘルカイザー亮VSマスター鮫島

REGULAR.description:
Chancellor Samejima returns to Duel Academy to announce the start of the GX Tournament!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genex Opens! Aim to be Number One!
ジェネックス開幕! 目指せ1番!

REGULAR.description:
Someone has stolen The Winged Dragon of Ra and is using it to cause mayhem and destruction at Duel Academy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami no Card "Ra no Tsubasa Kamiryuu" o Ayatsuru Otoko!?
The God Card, "Ra, the Winged Dragon" Manipulated by a Normal Man!?
神のカード「ラーの翼神竜」を操る男!?

REGULAR.description:
Pro duelist and Broadway star Kabukid faces Judai in a duel that’s a real showstopper!
Source: crunchyroll

Judai duels Jun in an attempt to break Saio`s hold over him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Your Best! Ojama Trio (Part One)
がんばれ! おジャマトリオ(前編)

REGULAR.description:
Judai, with the help of the Ojamas, tries to bring Jun to his senses.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Do Your Best! Ojama Trio (Part Two)
がんばれ! おジャマトリオ(後編)

REGULAR.description:
Fubuki’s alter ego Nightshroud returns to face Ryo in a Shadow Game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘルカイザーVSダークネス吹雪

REGULAR.description:
In an attempt to save their careers, Cronos and Bonaparte enlist the help of two old friends – Damon and Mokeo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アカデミアのプライド

Cronos and Bonaparte face off against Pegasus to win a job at his company!

Judai battles Asuka in an attempt to win back her friendship.

titles.title: A White Night Duel! Juudai VS Asuka (Part One)
Byakuya no Kettou! Juudai vs Asuka (Zenpen)
白夜の決闘! 十代VS明日香(前編)

White Night`s Dragon! Juudai vs Asuka
白夜龍(ホワイトナイツドラゴン)! 十代VS明日香

titles.title: Jingi Naki Kyoudai Duel: Ryou vs Shou
The Brothers` Duel of Morals, Ryou VS Shou

titles.title: Relativity Field! Judai VS The Genius Professor

Duelist League World Champion, DD, defends his title for the first time in 10 years against criminal mastermind, Doctor Collector.

titles.title: 登場! 謎の世界チャンプ!

Edo faces-off against DD and discovers that his stepfather’s been hiding some inner demons!

Tsui ni Hatsudou! Kyuukyoku no D no Card
ついに発動! 究極のDのカード

Juudai vs Laser Eisei no Kyoufu

titles.title: Une promesse de longue date - 1re partie
究極のアルカナ「ザ・ワールド」

The battle between Edo and Saio continues, and the fate of the entire planet hangs in the balance!

titles.title: Une promesse de longue date - 2e partie
エド, 必殺の一撃! 「ブルーD」

An evil alien has possessed Saio, and Judai must defeat him in order to save the people of Earth from becoming mindless zombies!

titles.title: Hikari no Hadou vs The Neo Spacians
Les mains de la justice - 1re partie

Shouri no Yukue wa?! Juudai vs Saiou

新学期スタート! 波乱の予感

Judai meets North Academy’s top student Johan Anderson, a duelist who can speak to monster spirits - just like Judai can!

titles.title: Mais qui est au bout du fil - 1re partie
プロフェッサー・コブラの刺客

十代と炎のオブライエン

Strange electromagnetic waves ignite Kenzan’s animal instincts as he battles Jim Cook and his pet crocodile Shirley!

Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Gem Beasts VS the Watchdogs of Hell
宝玉獣VS地獄の番犬(ヘル・ガンドッグ)

Professor Cobra raises the stakes by forcing Judai to duel on a tower where the only way down is a 20-story drop!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Decisive Battle! Judai VS Professor Cobra
決戦! 十代VSプロフェッサー・コブラ

REGULAR.description:
Judai continues his duel with Cobra but in a swamp full of serpents and snakes, will he be able to find victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terror! The King of Poisonous Serpents, Venominon
恐怖! 毒蛇王ヴェノミノン

REGULAR.description:
It’s now or never as Judai tries to defeat Cobra and his snakes before they swallow up Judai’s life points for good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トリプルコンタクト融合! マグマ・ネオス

REGULAR.description:
Judai and his friends find themselves in a different dimension where duel monsters are real, the ocean is a sea of sand and... Wait, class is still in session?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle in a Strange World! The Gem Beasts VS the Harpy Ladies
Isekai de no Tatakai! Hougyoku Juu vs Harpy Lady
異世界での戦い! 宝玉獣vsハーピィレディ

REGULAR.description:
After one of their classmates becomes ill, the gang ventures off to find a deserted submarine in the desert.  Can they find what they’re looking for, or is someone out to sink their plans before they get there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desert Survival! Johann VS The Doodlebug
Sabaku no Survival! Johan vs Arijigoku
砂漠のサバイバル! ヨハンVS蟻地獄

REGULAR.description:
As an army of Duel Ghouls slowly takes over Duel Academia, can Judai and his friends figure out a way to duel these ghouls, or will they all get schooled in the process?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crisis at Duel Academia! Fear of the Zombie Students
Duel Academia Kiki! Zombie Seito no Kyoufu!
デュエルアカデミア危機! ゾンビ生徒の恐怖!

REGULAR.description:
It’s an all-out battle with the Duel Ghouls as Judai tries to get Rei the medicine she needs.  Will she get the first aid in time, or have the Duel Ghouls prescribed a different kind of treatment for her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rei Kyuushuutsu Sakusen! Elemental Hero vs Datenshi Nurse
The Mission to Save Rei! Elemental Heroes VS the Fallen Angel Nurse
レイ救出作戦! E・ヒーローVS堕天使ナース

REGULAR.description:
When three rogue students go looking for food, they end up biting off more than they can chew.  And when Judai gets challenged, it soon becomes a battle with triple the action, triple the duels and triple the danger!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Division Amongst the Academy! A Duel of Hunger
Drei sind vier zu viel - Teil 1
学園分裂! 腹ペコデュエル

REGULAR.description:
With Johan, Jim, and O`Brien facing off against three masked duelists, there’s no telling what might happen.  It’s an all-out battle where the winners get their just desserts and the losers just get hungry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drei sind vier zu viel - Teil 2
Johan, Jim, O`Brien vs Kamen no San Kishi
Johan, Jim, and O`Brien VS the Three Masked Knights
ヨハン・ジム・オブライエンVS仮面の三騎士

REGULAR.description:
Judai finally confronts the student formally known as Martin.  But before Judai can find out who’s who, a roaring rumble begins to unravel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai VS Manjoume, Dragon Soldier Dark Sword
Juudai vs Manjoume, Ryuukishi Dark Sword
十代VS万丈目・竜騎士ダークソード

REGULAR.description:
As Judai tries to stop the Three Sacred Beasts from being released, a battle for the beasts begins as Amon Garam decides to go for the cards himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 封印を破りし者・マルタン

REGULAR.description:
It’s a duel between two dimensions as Ryo and Johan square off in a back-and-forth battle to get back home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hougyoku Juu VS Cyber End Dragon
The Gem Beasts VS Cyber End Dragon
宝玉獣VSサイバー・エンド・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
As Johan sets his sights on recovering the legendary Rainbow Dragon, Judai finds himself dueling an unfamiliar friend whose sights are set on revenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: San Maboroshi Ma no Kyoui! Juudai vs Martin
Threat of the three legendary demons! Judai Vs. Martin
三幻魔の脅威! 十代VSマルタン

REGULAR.description:
It’s all or nothing as Johan and Judai team up against an enemy from Judai’s past.  Can Johan’s Rainbow Dragon lead them to victory, or will their opponent’s deck slay this ultimate beast and any hopes they have of getting back home?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The awakening of the rainbow dragon
レインボードラゴン覚醒

REGULAR.description:
Most of the students have returned from the alternate universe only to find that a few of their friends were left behind.  Full of guilt, Judai concocts a dangerous plan to get them back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ace Card Dai Shuugou!! Ake, Jigen no Tobira!
Grand gathering of ace cards!! Open door of different dimension
エースカード大集合!! 開け, 次元の扉!

REGULAR.description:
Having agreed to go find Johan, Judai and the gang find themselves journeying through a strange dark world where getting your game on involves risking more than just your life points!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 生死を賭けた決闘(デュエル)

REGULAR.description:
The search for Jesse continues as Judai battles a fiend named Scarr.  Can Judai defeat this member of the Dark Army, or will this duel send him to the stars?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai Vs. Scarr, scout of dark world
Juudai vs Ankokukai no Sekkou Scarr
十代VS暗黒界の斥候スカー

REGULAR.description:
After hearing that Johan may be imprisoned in a camp nearby, Judai decides to risk everything to try and free his friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai Vs. Zure, knight of dark world
Juudai vs Ankokukai no Kishi Zure
十代VS暗黒界の騎士ズール

REGULAR.description:
With the fate of his friends on the line, Judai looks to dethrone the Mad King of Dark World before his pals become a page in history!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai Vs. Brron, mad king of dark world
Juudai vs Ankokukai no Kyou Ou Brron
十代VS暗黒界の狂王ブロン

REGULAR.description:
The battle rages on as Judai looks to free his friends from the Mad King’s clutches.  Can Judai end the reign of his opponent, or will the King end up giving him the royal treatment?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Activate sacred scriptures of wickedness! Reing-beaux, evil lord of dark realm
Jashin Kyouten Hatsudou! Ankokukai no Majin Rein
邪心経典発動! 暗黒界の魔神レイン

REGULAR.description:
After witnessing his closest friends being sent to the stars, Sho finds himself questioning the actions of his best friend Judai.  Is it game over for this friendship, or will Sho be willing to deal his friend a new hand?
Source: crunchyroll

Austin and Jim set off to confront the Supreme King, and after challenging him to a duel, they soon discover that this mysterious ruler is an all-too-familiar… friend?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Descent of supreme king - The death duelists
覇王降臨・死の決闘者(デュエリスト)たち

REGULAR.description:
After discovering that the Supreme King and Judai are one and the same, Jim looks to stare down the darkness controlling his friend and defeat it with a gift given to him long ago!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダーク・フュージョン! インフェルノ・ウイング!!

REGULAR.description:
With the help of the Eye of Orichalcum, Jim takes aim at the evil gripping Judai!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The first and probably last super fusion activation
空前絶後・超融合発動!

REGULAR.description:
After witnessing the dark powers of the Supreme King, Austin finds himself afraid for the first time in his life.  Can Austin face his fears, or will the guilt of running scared force him to give up dueling for good?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The supreme king of terror! The wandering O`Brien
恐怖の覇王! 彷徨えるオブライエン

REGULAR.description:
Looking to conquer his fears and face them head-on, Austin teams up with Edo and Ryo in a last ditch effort to save their friend Judai!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kachinokoru Mono ga Seigi! Haou vs O`Brien
The victor is righteous! The supreme king Vs. O`Brien
勝ち残る者が正義! 覇王VSオブライエン

REGULAR.description:
With the Supreme King strengthening his grip over Judai, Austin unleashes an all-out assault in the hopes of finally freeing his friend from the depths of darkness!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Volcanic Devil vs Saikyou no Evil Hero
Volcanic devil Vs. the most henious evil hero
ヴォルカニック・デビルVS最凶のイービル・ヒーロー

REGULAR.description:
In his quest for ultimate power, Amon Garam finds himself having to ask a dear friend to pay the ultimate price!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatsudou! Kyuukyoku Fuuin Kaihou Gishiki Jutsu
発動! 究極封印解放儀式術

REGULAR.description:
With the last of Echo’s duel energy at stake, Edo Phoenix looks to change her fate with his deck of Destiny Heroes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Summon the ultimate forbidden god, Exodia!
究極封印神エクゾディオス召喚!

REGULAR.description:
Hoping to teach his friend a valuable lesson, Ryo challenges Judai to a duel of heart-pounding proportions!
Source: crunchyroll

Under the guise of Johan, Yubel faces off against Ryo in a confrontation that ends up having heart-stopping consequences!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A clash of fate! Cyber-style Vs. The gem beasts
Innen no Taiketsu! Cyber Ryuu vs Hougyoku Juu
因縁の対決! サイバー流VS宝玉獣

REGULAR.description:
As the battle draws to a close, Ryo looks to make one last push to free Johan from Yubel’s mind-controlling clutches before his heart forces him to throw in the towel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuukyoku Dragon Taiketsu! Cyber End vs Rainbow Dark
The ultimate dragon showdown! Cyber end Vs. Dark rainbow
究極ドラゴン対決! サイバー・エンドVSレインボー・ダーク

REGULAR.description:
With the power of Exodia by his side, Amon Garam takes on Yubel in a duel to rule!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash of the demon gods! Mythic demon Vs. Exodia
Majin Taiketsu! Maboroshi Ma vs Exodia
魔神対決! 幻魔VSエクゾディア

REGULAR.description:
The clash between Amon and Yubel continues as Amon attempts to unleash the Ultimate Forbidden One!
Source: crunchyroll

Judai duels Johan in an attempt to break Yubel’s hold over him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ネオスvs アドバンスド宝玉獣

REGULAR.description:
Judai, with the help of his Elemental Heroes, tries to free Johan’s spirit from Yubel’s control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 超融合発動! レインボー・ネオス!

REGULAR.description:
With Johan safe and sound, Judai agrees to settle the score once and for all with Yubel!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confrontation of the Chosen Cards! Elemental Heroes VS Yubel
Der oberste König kehrt zurück - Teil 1
Erabareshi Card Taiketsu! Elemental Hero vs Yubel
Le retour de l`ultime souverain - 1re partie
選ばれしカード対決! エレメンタル・ヒーローVSユベル

REGULAR.description:
With the help of Johan’s deck and the power of the Supreme King, Judai looks to deal a final blow to Yubel and  free his friends from their dimensional detentions!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der oberste König kehrt zurück - Teil 2
Le retour de l`ultime souverain - 2e partie

REGULAR.description:
In order to free his friends, Judai must first figure out a way to destroy Yubel’s ultimate incarnation!  Can Judai stop the unstoppable, or will this nightmare of a beast put any and all dreams of a rescue to rest?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der oberste König kehrt zurück - Teil 3
Le retour de l`ultime souverain - 3e partie
Rainbow Neos VS Yubel Ultimate Form
レインボー・ネオスvsユベル究極態

REGULAR.description:
Manjoume, Asuka, Kenzan, Shou, Fubuki, Chronos, O`Brien, Jim, and Johan have returned to Duel Academy. Juudai has not. A week later, he still hasn`t come back and neither have Misawa and Ryou. A picture of the three of them hangs in the cafeteria of the Red Dorm. Manjoume looks at the picture and remembers the first time he dueled Juudai. While Manjoume tries to escape his feelings, Shou trusts that Juudai will come back, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai Revived!? A Brand New Journey
十代復活!? 新たなる旅立ち

REGULAR.description:
Juudai returns to Duel Academy, and a month goes by. Johan, O`Brien, Amon, and Jim return to their respective schools. Shou, Manjoume, and Rei move to the Blue Dorm and their new school lives start, but Juudai refuses to leave the Red Dorm, locking himself in instead. Amidst all this, a sudden malfunction occurs in the Duel System. Cards that don`t respond in Solid Vision begin to appear. To find the cause, Manjoume, Asuka, and Fujiwara Yusuke investigate the computer room. Meanwhile, Juudai receives a cell phone from an unknown sender, and with it, certain information.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 忍びよる脅威! 「謎の来訪者」

REGULAR.description:
Juudai`s discovered the truth about the mysterious student, Fujiwara Yusuke. He`s also made a weighty decision, turning in his letter of withdrawal from school to Principal Samejima. Samejima refuses to accept it, suggesting, instead, that Juudai meet with certain people - Kagemaru and Saiou. Kagemaru and Saiou have come to tell Juudai of the coming danger they sense. A man in a suit appears before the three of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Duel Academia! The Path Judai Chooses
Saraba Duel Academia! Juudai no Erabu Michi
さらばデュエルアカデミア! 十代の選ぶ道

REGULAR.description:
It was O`Brien who saved Fubuki from Fujiwara Yusuke. O`Brien receives a new mission from the II Company and returns to Duel Academy. In order to solve the mystery of Darkness, Juudai decides to duel Fubuki. Fubuki calls on the powers of Darkness and summons the Red-eyes Black Dragon. He then sacrifices Red-eyes Black Dragon to special summon Red-eyes Darkness Dragon, and attacks Juudai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Darkness no Shinsou! Juudai vs Fubuki
The Truth Behind Darkness! Judai VS Fubuki
ダークネスの真相! 十代VS吹雪

REGULAR.description:
Fujiwara Yusuke is actually the spirit of the card Honest. Confronted with this, Juudai uses the strength of Yubel, who lies within him, to withstand Honest`s attacks. He asks Honest about the strange phenomenons and Honest begins explaining. Darkness` envoys Trueman and Mister T witness this and attack in an attempt to erase Juudai. The attack critically wounds Honest. Rage overtakes Juudai and he challenges Mister T to a Duel. On his first turn, Mister T summons F.G.D.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fusing Souls! Neos VS F.G.D. (Five God Dragon)
Yuugou Suru Tamashii! Neos vs Five God Dragon
融合する魂! ネオスVS F・G・D

REGULAR.description:
Kenzan and the other second-years plan a Duel party as a way to make some memories. Meanwhile, Asuka worries over what her future plans should be - stay at the Academy and become an instructor at the kids school, or go overseas to study. The Duel party becomes an event with boy-girl pairs where upper-classmen Duel lower-classmen. When Asuka finds out who she`s paired with, her partner just happens to be Juudai.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shall We Duel? Invitation to a Pair Duel
Shall We Duel? Pair Duel e no Shoutai
シャル・ウイ・デュエル? ペアデュエルへの招待

REGULAR.description:
It`s the final round of the pair Duels. Juudai and Asuka will be fighting Kenzan and Rei. Asuka plans her strategy and lays out her cards. Meanwhile, Rei confirms that Juudai and Asuka aren`t in sync with each other, and lays out cards in a very deliberate manner. Juudai checks with Asuka to see what cards she has, but completely ignores Asuka`s intent as he moves forward in his Duel. This makes Asuka angry. In contrast, Rei reveals her face-down card, and it`s...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Judai VS Asuka: Face-Down Card of Hidden Emotions
Juudai vs Asuka: Himeta Omoi no Fuse Card
十代VS明日香 秘めた想いの伏せカード

REGULAR.description:
Someone attacks Principal Samejima. He`s a man who can use the Psycho Arts which developed around the same time as the Cyber Arts, a man named Inotsume Makoto. He aims to crush the Cyber Arts to make the Psycho Arts the main school. After defeating Samejima, previously a Cyber Arts teacher, his next target is... the successor to the Cyber Arts school, Marufuji Ryou. Ryou is in the Academy infirmary attempting to recover. Inotsume appears before him in his weakened state with a letter of challenge. Ryou and Inotsume face off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: サイコ・ショッカーからの挑戦状

REGULAR.description:
Shou declares that he`ll take over the Duel from Ryou. He practices using Ryou`s deck, but it doesn`t go well. Juudai appears before Shou to tell him, "you can`t just try to copy Ryou. That deck`s fought alongside Ryou all this time. It`ll see through anyone trying to copy him. Listen to the deck and make it your own." Shou and Inotsume face off. At first, Shou fights using the same tactics as his older brother, and Inotsume fights the same way he did before. Then, Shou summons Cyber Dark Dragon and Inotsume special summons Psycho Shocker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 受け継がれしサイバー・ダーク・ドラゴン

REGULAR.description:
Manjoume aims to become a pro Duelist without any help from his older brothers, but all he receives are rejection notifications. Unable to simply stand by and watch Manjoume like this, Chronos takes him to Ed`s yacht. Once there, Chronos asks Ed to take Manjoume on as his apprentice. Manjoume does become Ed`s apprentice, but the daily life of the pro Duelist "Ed" is something he never could have imagined - phones that start ringing at 7 am, asking for interviews, long lines at meet-and-greets... And the most surprising thing, the blood-stained Duel training that Ed, so often called a genius, puts himself through.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mokusase! Manjoume, Pro Duelist e no Michi!
Shoot for it! Manjoume, the Path to a Pro Duelist!
目指せ! 万丈目, プロデュエリストへの道!

REGULAR.description:
Having lost an important card, Ed retires from being a pro. Meanwhile, Manjoume teams up with Mike and he suddenly becomes a star. Ed`s former secretary, Emeralda, appears and tells him who really stole the card. Thinking that Manjoume should be made an even bigger star, Mike arranges a rematch with his former mentor, Ed. Before the match, Manjoume visits Juudai and makes a request. Then, Manjoume and Ed`s rematch begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Armed Dragon VS Dragoon D End
Armed Dragon vs Dragoon D End
アームド・ドラゴンVSドラグーン・D・エンド

REGULAR.description:
When Chronos looks at the graduation album Kenzan and the others made, he shouts and holds an even more demanding lesson than usual, giving them math lessons, making them study kanji and do push-ups... When they boycott the lessons and the they get cancelled, he chases them around. Unable to watch any longer, Juudai challenges Chronos to a duel. The two of them face off in a way they haven`t since the entrance exam. Chronos summons Antique Gear Soldier and Juudai summons Flame Wingman.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gratitude Duel! Chronos VS The Original Dropout Boy
Ongaeshi Duel! Chronos vs Ganso Dropout Boy
恩返しデュエル! クロノスVS元祖ドロップアウト・ボーイ

REGULAR.description:
At last, Duel Academy`s graduation duels begin. Juudai is ready to enjoy the duels, but there`s a line of students with Duel requests for him. There`s a second-year student named Sorano in the Blue Dorm who is said to be quite skilled, and things end up with Juudai dueling him. On his first turn, Sorano raises his Horus Black Flame Dragon from level 4 to level 8.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sotsugyou Duel Kaishi! Neos vs Horus no Kuro Enryuu
The Graduation Duel Starts! Neos VS Black Flame Dragon of Horus
卒業デュエル開始! ネオスVSホルスの黒炎竜

REGULAR.description:
Mister T appears in front of O`Brien. The two of them begin a Duel. O`Brien summons Volcanic Edge, and takes 500 life points. Mister T summons Dark Archetype, and Volcanic Edge`s attack allows him to summon a new monster, Dark Psycho Eye. When he does, impossibly, O`Brien`s father appears before him. Knowing that he can`t let himself falter, O`Brien tries to stay calm, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ketsudan no Daishou! O`Brien Honoo no Yami
The Price of Decision! Darkness in the O`Brien Fire
決断の代償! オブライエン炎の闇

REGULAR.description:
A tremendous number of Mister Ts appear and surround Juudai. Juudai is left with nowhere to run. Suddenly a figure appears... it`s Saiou. He has important information to relay to Juudai, who has escaped from Mister T - Mister T`s target is Duel Academy. However, Saiou can`t let Juudai go to the academy, so he challenges him to a Duel. Juudai has no choice but to accept. Saiou uses a combo of The Fool and Tour of the Dead cornering Juudai by rendering him unable to summon monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saiou Futatabi! "Zettai Unmei Kettei Ryoku" Hatsudou!!
Saiou Returns! Activate the "Decisive Power of Absoulte Destiny"!!
斎王再び! 「絶対運命決定力」発動!!

REGULAR.description:
With the Sowing of the Fool, Juudai`s deck is whittled away quickly, leaving him in a bind. Just then, he hears the voice of the Winged Kuribo and manages to counterattack, the upright position of the Dark Ruler allowing him to attack twice during battle phase 2. Cornered and left with only 13 cards, Juudai hears Mizuchi`s voice asking him to save Saiou. Knowing that the only way to save Saiou is to defeat him, Juudai steels his nerve and confronts Saiou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The End of Destiny! Magma Neos VS The Dark Ruler
Unmei no Shuuen! Magma Neos vs The Dark Ruler
運命の終焉! マグマ・ネオスVSザ・ダーク・ルーラー

REGULAR.description:
His battle with Saiou finished, Juudai starts to head for Duel Academy, but before he can Mister T appears. Meanwhile, at Duel Academy, Mister T`s evil influence spreads, and a Duel unfolds between Kenzan and Mister T in the guise of Sorano. Juudai duels Mister T, but Mister T starts using a Crystal Beasts deck, a deck only Johan should possess. Juudai worries that Johan might have fallen at Mister T`s hand even as he desperately battles the Crystal Beasts...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel Academia Crisis! The Gem Beast Blocking the way
Duel Academia no Kiki! Tachi wa Dakaru Hougyoku Juu
デュエルアカデミアの危機! 立ちはだかる宝玉獣

REGULAR.description:
At Duel Academy, Sorano, hijacked by Mister T, attacks student after student, leading them into the world of Darkness. The only ones left at the academy are Fubuki and Manjoume, and Asuka, Junko, and Momoe. Finally, Mister T appears before them and attacks. The students defeated by Mister T are dragged into the world of Darkness, and those remaining lose their memories of the students who are gone. Manjoume and Asuka are defeated by Mister T, and Fubuki, who has lost his memory of them, prowls the empty academy campus. That`s when Darkness appears before him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダークネスの侵攻! 奪われた記憶

REGULAR.description:
Darkness is actually Fujiwara Yusuke. Fujiwara speaks of the magnificence of the World of Darkness, but Fubuki opposes his thinking. Fujiwara activates the field magic Clear World, conferring a Negative Effect on Fubuki. On top of this, he summons a high level clear monster, Clear Vise Dragon. Clear Vise Dragon is a monster which increases it`s fellow monsters` offensive abilities two-fold. Fubuki finds himself in a dire situation. And, unrelenting in his attacks, Fujiwara shows Fubuki the darkness in the hearts of Majoume, Asuka, Shou and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Activate! "Clear World" Terror of Negative Effect
Hatsudou! "Clear World" Kyoufu no Nagatei Bueruikuto
発動! 「クリアー・ワールド」恐怖のネガティブエフェクト

REGULAR.description:
Juudai and Johan form a tag team and begin a Duel against Fujiwara. Fujiwara initiates field magic, Clear World, activating a Negative Effect. He launches a combo of Clear Rage Golem and Clear Phantom against Juudai. But with Johan`s support, Juudai escapes the situation. Fujiwara realizes that won`t win unless he can sever the bonds between Juudai and Johan, so he peers into Johan`s heart to find the darkness within.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Royale! Judai vs. Johan vs. Fujiwara
Battle Royale! Juudai vs Johan vs Fujiwara
バトルロワイヤル! 十代VSヨハンVS藤原

REGULAR.description:
Juudai and Johan versus Fujiwara, the conclusion. Fujiwara tries to break the strong bonds between Juudai and Johan by using the darkness within Johan`s heart, and fails. Their bonds cause Fujiwara to fly into a rage and he activates Attribute Gravity. The effects cause Johan`s monsters` attacks to hit Juudai`s monsters. When it`s time for Juudai to attack, Fujiwara activates Attribute Chameleon which makes Juudai`s monsters attack Johan`s monsters. As Fujiwara causes their monsters to attack each other in denial of their bonds, Honest appears and speaks of Fujiwara`s tragic past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kizuna o Mamorishimo no Rainbow Neos vs Clear Vicious Knight
Rainbow Neos, Protector of Bonds vs. Clear Vicious Knight
絆を守りしものレインボー・ネオスVSクリアー・ヴィシャス・ナイト

REGULAR.description:
Juudai successfully separates Fujiwara from Darkness, but the world is still engulfed in the shadow of a solar eclipse. In this gloom, the real Darkness appears. He tells Juudai that the World of Darkness is made of the darkness that lies in duelists` hearts. To save everyone from the World of Darkness, Juudai challenges him to a duel. Darkness launches a terrifying combo of Nothingness and Infinity, while Juudai...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Combo of Terror! "Nihility and Infinity"
恐怖のコンボ!「虚無(ゼロ)と無限(インフィニティ)」

REGULAR.description:
Juudai combines Neos and Yubel to summon Neos Wiseman to attack Darkness. Darkness simply smiles and revives Darkness Eye activating the Nothingness and Infinity combo. As the offense and defense unfold, advancing and retreating, Juudai learns a shocking truth from Darkness - the shape of the future of humanity. Juudai fights with the fate of the human race in the balance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最後の希望! 遊城十代

REGULAR.description:
In an ultimate contact fusion, Juudai summons God Neos and defeats Darkness. The world returns to the way it was and Shou and the others run to meet Juudai. Then...it`s time for the graduation ceremony. Chronos wipes away tears and does a terrible job as the MC. As the representative of the underclassmen, Kenzan reads a farewell speech, but his tears make it impossible to understand. Asuka, Shou, Manjoume, Juudai and the others give the graduates their diplomas. That evening, they hold a thank-you party, but Juudai is nowhere to be seen. As Juudai packs, getting ready to go on a journey, a Winged Kurinbo appears to lead him to a particular place...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Farewell, Judai! A Tearful Graduation Ceremony
さよなら十代! 涙の卒業式

REGULAR.description:
Yuuki Juudai versus Mutou Yuugi. With the Winged Kurinbo`s guidance, Juudai flies to Mutou Yuugi`s world. Yuugi holds the God card, and Dueling him will be Juudai`s real graduation Duel. It will also be a fight where Juudai, who has fought continuously for three years, will find something he`s lost. Juudai summons Neos and Yuugi summons Black Magician. It`s the start of a furious Duel. How will it end?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shin no Sotsugyou Duel! Juudai vs Densetsu no Duelist
The True Graduation Duel ! Judai VS Legendary Duelist
真の卒業デュエル! 十代VS伝説のデュエリスト

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 遊戯王デュエルモンスターズGX

titles.title: Yuu Gi Ou: Duel Monsters GX
เกมกลคนอัจฉริยะ ดูเอลมอนสเตอร์ GX
遊戯王デュエルモンスターズGX
遊☆戯☆王デュエルモンスターズGX
